server.rest.controllers

Class HRPayGradeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.rest.controllers.Controller
      • server.rest.controllers.HRPayGradeController

  • @CrossOrigin(origins={"http://localhost:1234","http://theterminal.s3-website.us-west-2.amazonaws.com"})
 @RestController
public class HRPayGradeController
extends Controller
    Controller for HR PayGrade table Provides all the REST endpoints related to HR Pay Grades and stored SQL procedures

                                                                              java.lang.String token)

        Parameters:
        token - The unique token of the user making the API call
        Returns:
        Response containing all the paygrades or an error response

      • addPayGrade

        @RequestMapping(value="/paygrades/add")
public Response addPayGrade(@RequestParam(value="token")
                                                                     java.lang.String token,
                                                                     @RequestParam(value="startAmount")
                                                                     int startAmt,
                                                                     @RequestParam(value="endAmount")
                                                                     int endAmt,
                                                                     @RequestParam(value="name")
                                                                     java.lang.String name)
        REST API link to add a pay grade in the database
        Parameters:
        token - The unique token of the User making the API call
        startAmt - The start amount of the pay grade
        endAmt - The end amount of the pay grade
        name - The name of the pay grade
        Returns:
        Response containing the newly added paygrade or an error response

public HRAddEditPayGradeResponse editPayGrade(@RequestParam(value="token")

                                                                                        @RequestParam(value="name")
                                                                                        java.lang.String name)
        REST API link to edit a pay grade in the database
        Parameters:
        token - The unique token of the User making the API call
        id - The id of the pay grade being edited
        startAmt - The start amount of the pay grade
        endAmt - The end amount of the pay grade
        name - The name of the pay grade
        Returns:
        Response containing the updated paygrade or an error response
